description:
Arc begins his days an adventurer-for-hire, but in spite of his fearsome strength, he still needs to keep a low profile. Luckily, he finds the perfect inaugural quest for his inconspicuous new life... or does he?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A First Job, a Girl`s Wish, and an Approaching Shadow
Der erste Auftrag, die Bitte eine Mädchens und ein sich nähender Schatten
Hatsushigoto, Shoujo no Negai to Shinobiyoru Kage
Première demande, le souhait de la fille et l`ombre menaçante
Первое задание, желание девочки и крадущаяся тень
初仕事, 少女の願いと忍び寄る影
